name: Planetary Defensive Manoeuvres
description:
Survive the relentless onslaught of the Sun's  coronal mass ejects while avoiding the hazards of Asteroids and Alien fire.

Planetary Defensive Manoeuvres is a fully voiced, arcade style bullet-hell survival game. Avoid the damage and live long enough to see another day. 

This edutainment style game is designed to be easy to pick up but addictive due to its excellent music. It's a first video game project so is a little rough around the edges but definitely a solid few minutes of entertainment.

I hope you enjoy and remember: Success isn't measured by how much we achieve, but by how hard we try.
